Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by implying that the overcrowded railway station is a recent incident during the coronavirus pandemic, when in fact the video is from two years ago.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a video that is unrelated to the coronavirus pandemic and is two years old.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video depicts irresponsible behavior during the pandemic, without considering the actual context of the video.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the video shows a crowd of students at a railway station during an examination for the recruitment of constables in West Bengal, which is unrelated to the coronavirus pandemic.
